attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-0817

Date: 2003-06-03

                     Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Canadian Heritage, pursuant to section 23 of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation Act, hereby appoints the following persons to be members of the Investment Committee of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation to hold office for a term of two years:


                     Ralph R. Weekes

                     Ancaster, Ontario


                     Lynrod Douglas

                     Toronto, Ontario



                     Sur recommandation de la ministre du Patrimoine canadien et en vertu de l’article 23 de la Loi sur la Fondation canadienne des relations raciales, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil nomme les personnes suivantes, membres du comité des placements de la Fondation canadienne des relations raciales pour un mandat de deux ans :


                     Ralph R. Weekes

                     Ancaster (Ontario)


                     Lynrod Douglas

                     Toronto (Ontario)
